format: Makefile configuration and shell script mix
description: This file appears to be a combination of configuration snippets, variable definitions, package and file specifications, and build/install procedures for a GNU GCC target recipe within a Yocto/bitbake project. It includes package dependencies, file installations, custom build commands, and symbolic link creations specific to a cross-compiler build.

methods.name: do_compile
methods.description: Configures the gcc build, modifies configuration headers to ensure reproducibility, and compiles the gcc components.

methods.name: do_install
methods.description: Installs the compiled gcc, cleans up build artifacts, creates necessary symlinks, and sets permissions.

methods.name: do_install:append
methods.description: Prunes header files generated during the build to ensure deterministic include-fixed contents.
